name: pnp-list-site-collection-lists
title: List site collections and their lists
shortDescription: Script helps you to list and export all site collection and their lists SharePoint Online sites.
longDescription: This script helps you to list and export all site collection and their lists SharePoint Online sites, ideal for getting insights into the size of your environment.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
